title: Bug 120315: Display property set to 'none' not taking effect in new pdf emitter
description: When the display property of an item is set to 'none', it doesn't have any effect in the new pdf emitter.
OB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none', it doesn't take effect in the new pdf emitter.
EB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none', it should hide the item in the new pdf emitter.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Add a label to the PDF document.
2. Open the 'properties' view for the label.
3. In the 'properties' view, set the 'sectionDisplay' to 'none'.
4. View the PDF document using the new pdf emitter and observe that the label is still visible.
